name: Dev-Link
description: React + TypeScript frontend with Node/Express TypeScript backend and PostgreSQL (Supabase) database. Job board app sample.

auth_summary.frontend: Client-side auth through React Context + localStorage. AuthProvider persists user object to localStorage and exposes login(username) and logout() methods. ProtectedRoutes redirects to /login if no user.
auth_summary.backend: Auth routes exist under /api/auth with controllers for signup/login/logout. Backend uses JWT_SECRET and likely issues tokens or cookies (examine controllers for specifics).

migration_runner.behavior: Executes SQL file on startup if it exists. If missing, logs and skips.

debuging_tips: If you receive ENOTFOUND for your DB host, verify POSTGRES_URI and DNS resolution (ping/nslookup).
URL-encode special characters in the DB password when embedding into a connection string.
Run migrations manually with psql if needed: psql "postgresql://user:pass@host:5432/postgres" -f backend/migrations/001_initial_schema.sql
how_to_use_with_ai: Provide this JSON (ai_project_manifest.json) and AI_PROJECT_SUMMARY.md to the AI model.
Provide redacted .env values (replace secrets with placeholders).
Provide package.json (root and backend) if the AI needs exact dependency versions.
